text: us aurath ne jis ke ghar mein yousuf thein yousuf ko behlana phuslana shuro kiya ke wo apne nafs ki nigrani chohd de aur darwaze bandh kar ke kehne lagi lo aa jao, yousuf ne kaha Allah ki panaah! wo mera rub hai mujhe us ne bahuth acchi tarah rakha hai, be-insaafi karne walo ka bhala nahi hota
